thread.title: The Blondes, do have more fun fun fun.
thread.title_full: The Blondes, do have more fun fun fun. - Review of 11 Howard, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kimberly M
title: The Blondes, do have more fun fun fun.
text:
The place is cool, staff excellent , food great (best grilled cheese and tomato soup ever) rooms are beautiful , and fun fun fun. you can ask for feather or non feather pillows , beds are cozy.
great place to stay , you cant ask for more if you want a great NYC experience. The Blonde is the coolest club in NYC and its in the Hotel.
I cant wait to go back, they make you feel so welcome.
Kim M
